name: Recurring Dream
description:
"Every night, in my dreams, I visit the mountain where it all happened. 

I keep coming back to this place again and again. To same mountain where I lost you forever. In my dreams, you are still here. I'm trying to reach you. To be with you once again. I'll never stop trying."

Recurring Dream is a short, 30min first-person exploration game. Trek across a cold, majestic mountain as you hear the story of why you are here.
